EmailTemplate.name: Live Follow Up - Complete
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for contacting Luxury Presence Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you so much for reaching out to the Luxury Presence Support team today. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach back out. We're always here for you.
By the way, you’ll receive an email soon asking about your experience working with me. If you could spare a moment to fill it out, I’d be very grateful!
Best regards, {!User.FirstName} Luxury Presence Support (310) 955-1077 support@luxurypresence.com
